Agile Alliance Membership

Join the Worlds Leading Agile Community

Agile Alliance is a global nonprofit member organization dedicated to promoting the concepts of Agile software development as outlined in the Agile Manifesto. We are a thriving and diverse community of nearly 70,000 who share your passion for Agile values, principles, and practices!

Individual
Membership

Enjoy all of the resources and benefits available to Agile Alliance members.

$99 per year

Invoiced securely via credit card. Membership discounts are available for education, and for financial hardship.*

SIGN UP NOW

Full Membership $99

Education Membership $49

Financial Hardship $49

*To confirm that you qualify for a discount, you may be asked for proof of eligibility.

Become a member and get full access to all resources on our website plus:

  • Discounts on Agile Alliance and 3rd party events
  • Members-only resources like Conference Session Videos and Experience Reports
  • Submit original content for our blog
  • Create an Agile Alliance Initiative
  • Post for-profit events and market your books on our website

Corporate
Membership

Membership for organizations with a discount for multiple employees.

$250 per year*

*Starting cost for 5 members from one company. We offer plans for 5 up to an unlimited number of employees.

SIGN UP NOW

Up to 5 Members $250

Up to 15 Members $500

Up to 25 Members $750

Up to 100 Members $1,500

Up to 500 Members $3,500

Unlimited Members $7,500

Ready to join your team? Check to see if your company is already a member.

You get all of the benefits of Individual Membership, plus:

  • A set of Individual Memberships for employees based on your membership tier
  • Manage your employee memberships from a convenient dashboard
  • Listing in our Corporate Member Directory
  • Logo placement on our website

Agile Alliance
Subscriber

Newsletter subscription with limited access to additional site resources.

Free

Subscribe now with a simple sign-up. You can upgrade to a full membership or cancel your subscription at any time.

SUBSCRIBE NOW

Want to learn more about us before becoming a member? Subscribe today!

As an Agile Alliance Subscriber, youll:

  • Receive the Agile Alliance newsletter
  • Get limited access to site resources and featured content

See All Features and Benefits

The Benefits of Membership

These are just some of the great reasons to join Agile Alliance! View all Features and Benefits.

Get Conference Discounts

Agile Alliance conferences are legendary for their great speakers, invaluable networking opportunities, irreplaceable community bonding experiences, interesting workshops, and great social events. As a Member, you can save as much as $750 on one conference alone!

View Conference Videos

While theres no substitute for actually attending one of our conferences, the next best thing is watching videos of the sessions. Agile Alliance members get access to members-only Conference Session Presentations and other video content.

View Research Papers

As a Member, you have access to our collection of in-depth research papers. Published in conjunction with IEEE, these are for you!

Promote Events and Classes

Do you offer Agile training classes or conferences? As a Member, you can list your event on our website to get the word out to the greater Agile community.

Create an Agile Alliance Initiative

Have an idea to support the Agile Community but need some help? As a Member, you can create an Agile Alliance Initiative and pursue your goals with the input of a vast network of Agile professionals.

Market Your Books

Have you written a book on an Agile topic or theme? As a member, you can post your book in our directory and have it viewed by a highly-targeted Agile audience.

Join a Thriving Community of Agile Professionals

Your membership enables Agile Alliance to offer a wealth of first-rate resources, present renowned international events, support global community groups, and more all geared toward helping Agile practitioners reach their full potential and deliver innovative solutions.

Help our community by joining today!

JOIN AGILE ALLIANCE NOW

View Agile Extension to the BABOK and Agile Practice Guide +

View Agile Extension to the BABOK and Agile Practice Guide

Agile Extension to the BABOK and Agile Practice Guide

The Agile Extension to the BABOK provides guidance for Agile practitioners, or anyone interested in leveraging effective Agile business analysis, to create better business outcomes that add real business and customer value. The Agile Practice Guide provides tools, situational guidelines, and an understanding of the various Agile approaches available to enable better results.

Request Sponsorship for anOpen Space Technology (OST) event that promotes the concepts of agile software development. This benefit does not apply to conferences that are run by the Agile Alliance.

Request Speaker Travel Reimbursement

As a part of the Speaker Reimbursment Initiative, user groups can request Travel Reimbursementfor a Speaker at a Community Group Meeting. Agile Alliance works to support Agile-oriented users groups by offering grants that can be used to reimburse speakers traveling to events if the user group cant find sponsorship from any other source.

SIGN UP NOW

Frequently Asked Questions

Click the question boxes below for answers to your membership questions

Individual Membership Questions

What is the difference between Individual Membership types?

There are 4 different types of Individual Membership. Each membership lasts one year and provides access to all the same resources.

  • Full Membership: Our standard membership type and rate.
  • Hardship: For those who are unemployed at the time of sign-up.
  • Academic: For faculty and staff of colleges & universities.
  • Student: For full-time students working towards a degree.

How long does membership last?

Individual and Corporate memberships last for 1 year. Subscribing is free and lasts indefinitely.

Where do I find my expiration date?

To find your expiration date, log into your Agile Alliance account and click the Profile Icon in the top right corner. You should see the option to Edit Profile. Once you are at your profile, your account expiration date is at the very top of the page.

How do I renew my membership?

To renew your membership, log into your Agile Alliance account and click the Profile Icon in the top right corner. You should see the option to Renew Membership or to Upgrade Membership depending on your current account status.

How do I cancel my membership?

To cancel your membership, navigate to the Subscriptions section on your profile page/membership portal page. From there, click the “Cancel” link.

Once you cancel, your membership will not renew. However, you will still have access to member benefits until your original expiration date.

Click here to see your subscriptions.

How do I change my email address or password?

If you would like to change any details of your account, log into Agile Alliance and click the Profile Icon in the top right corner. Once at your profile, you can change your personal information as well as add a picture or bio. You will notice you are unable to change your username. However, if you change your email address, you will be able to log in using that email address and all contact with Agile Alliance will be sent to it as well.

How do I change the billing info for my Auto Renew Membership Subscription?

You can update your payment/billing information HERE.

Corporate Membership Questions

How do I know if my company has a corporate membership?

You can search for your company in our corporate membership directory

My company has a corporate membership how do I sign up?

Sub accounts under your corporate membership are controlled within your company. You will want to search for your company in the corporate membership directory to find out who the corporate contact is and contact that person directly to request access.

How do I sign up my company and add my colleagues?

First, you will need to sign up your company for the level of membership that you require and assign one person as the corporate contact. This person will be the admin on the account and will be responsible for adding new members. Please see more information in our corporate membership directory

What is expected of the corporate contact?

This person will have the admin rights on the account which will allow them to edit the corporate profile, upload company logo, and add new members to the account.

Can there be more than one corporate contact?

No, you are required to assign this role to only one person.

Do corporate members receive the Agile Alliance membership discount for all employees?

No, in order to receive the membership discount each employee will require a membership profile. Either a sub account under the company’s corporate membership or their own Individual membership. We only allow one discount per member for each of our conferences.
